title: I want the last 2 hours of my life back!
review: Horrible, horrible, horrible! Kept hoping it was going to get better, but it didn't. I feel stupid wasting so much time to watch this terrible movie.

title: Great movie!
review: An amazing movie about human nature. I don't know if everyone will understand the complexity, however the way all the characters intertwined was fascinating and touching. I was moved by this movie and I am glad I watched it.
